title: Feelings. Part 2
creator_credit: Environment Audio Visuals, CVV Productions, Cate Fyffe and Justin Shortal
brief_description: A series of vignettes is presented each of which focuses on one of the following feelings: anger; jealousy; rejection and loneliness. The dramatised situations are usually open-ended thus providing a stimulus for discussion. High school students are used to play the roles. Teacher’s notes accompany the video.
